content: 3rd edge - short side single_crochet in each chain across to end 17sc work 2 more single_crochet in last st of the row to complete the corner turn strip ¼ turn to the right to work up the sides of row 4th edge - long side single_crochet in the side of every row up the long side of the strip you ll notice convenient holes up the edge from the turning chains - place your stitches there 163 total scs - since one row was worked in the 3scs of the corner work 1 more single_crochet in last st of the row to complete the corner you should end with 17scs on each short side and 164scs on each long side with 4 more scs - 1 for each corner mark those 4 corners for ease of joining strips later finish with an invisible join to complete the single_crochet round making sure to keep the stitch count accurate fasten o� prep border - for joining to strip 2 later attach joining color in either bottom-right corner row 1 work a stsc in corner st and double_crochet in each of next 21 sts *2dc in next st double_crochet in next 22 sts* repeat from * to * across 2dc in next st double_crochet in last 5sts 173dc *you worked 7 increases across the long side of the strip plus worked into the corner sts to match the row count on the next strip * fasten o� weave in ends and set aside for the next strip i hope you have enjoyed stitching this strip please share photos with us in the facebook group shopkimberlie cal 2024 - https //www facebook com/groups/940051480700972/
